transcript: Well, don't be ridiculous. Don't you know that? You're the one who probably wishes you were with somebody else. Somebody who knew how to enjoy herself and didn't take everything so hard.

segments.text: Well, don't be ridiculous. Don't you know that?
You're the one who probably wishes you were with somebody else.
Somebody who knew how to enjoy herself and didn't take everything so hard.
